executable.title: Clean Up Overla Labels
executable.description: Take a series of input binary images and clean up for those overlapped area. Binary volumes given first always wins out

image.name: inputBinaryVolumes
image.label: Input Binary Images
image.description: The list of binary images to be checked and cleaned up. Order is important. Binary volume given first always wins out.

image.name: outputBinaryVolumes
image.label: Output Label Volume
image.description: The output label map images, with integer values in it. Each label value specified in the inputLabels is combined into this output label map volume
